Check.definition: something that limits or restrains see also checks and balances 2
Check.origin: [ N ot S ufficient F unds]

1.definition: something that limits or restrains see also

2.definition: a written order signed by its maker directing a bank to pay a specified sum to a named person or to that person's order on demand see alsocompare

bank check.definition: a check drawn by a bank on its deposits in another bank

caÂ·shier's check.definition: a check drawn by a bank on its own funds and signed by the cashier or another bank official

certified check.definition: a check certified to be good by the bank upon which it is drawn by the signature of usually the cashier or paying teller with the wordoracross the face of the check
certified check.accepted: across the face of the check

NSF check.definition: [otufficientunds]a check drawn on an account with insufficient funds from which to make payment
